channel.title: Options to pickup custom items are messed up [Delta]
channel.description: I've seen this before on other delta servers and I was wondering how to fix it. When a custom item is on the ground (lets say a dragon platebody) and I right click on it the first option is ".. Dragon Platebody" and the second one is "Take Dragon Platebody". I can click take and it works fine but how can i make that the first option and remove the other one?

item.title: Options to pickup custom items are messed up [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Carnifex12 Carnifex12
item.description:
@Carnifex12 wrote:

I’ve seen this before on other delta servers and I was wondering how to fix it. When a custom item is on the ground (lets say a dragon platebody) and I right click on it the first option is “… Dragon Platebody” and the second one is “Take Dragon Platebody”. I can click take and it works fine but how can i make that the first option and remove the other one?

Read full topic
